tablelight 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

BIC(<light.zeroinfl>)

Bayesian information criterion implementation for stripped objects

addendum_stats()

An internal method to add some text to summary statistics part

arrange_coeff()

Arrange coefficients for the table

extract_alpha()

Methods to extract dispersion parameters in negative binomial settings

extract_coeff()

Methods to extract coefficients and related information from statistical models

light_table()

Produce latex tables from stripped objects to reduce memory needs

light_table_coefficients()

Prepare coefficients part of the latex table

light_table_header()

Header for the regression table

listcoeff()

A small method to extract coefficient names from econometric models

liststats()

A small method to extract statistics names relevent to econometric models

logLik(<light.zeroinfl>) logLik(<light.glm>)

Extract loglikelihood from a stripped object

mgsub()

Multiple gsub

secoeff()

Extract summary table for coefficients estimates

sigma(<oglmx>)

Recover residual standard deviation from ordered discrete model

signif_stars()

Transform pvalues into significance stars

str_to_regex()

Espace special characters in regex

strip()

strip: strip regressions

tablelight

lighttable: Regression tables using as little as possible RAM resources

variance_model()

Construct the dataframe used for variance estimation

view_html() print_html()

Report HTML table in Rstudio viewer or in a Rmarkdown document
